error.title: Error
error.message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.message: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error contact support.

unknownError.title: Unknown Error
unknownError.message: An unexpected error occurred. Our team has been notified and is working to fix the issue. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

delete.title: Delete Payee
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this payee? Deleting a payee will delete all transactions associated with it.
